name: It Came From Planet Oculon [Combat Prototype]
name_original: It Came From Planet Oculon [Combat Prototype]
description:
It Came From Planet Oculon is a top-down wave shooter with rogue-like elements. Fend off waves of alien invaders and earn upgrades to better equip yourself against the horde. In the [Combat Prototype] try to get a high score by defeating as many enemies as you can.

Employ 40+ powerups to dispatch the 6 unique enemies with more of each on the way!

The game is still in an early state so if you could let us know of any bugs or issues you encounter during gameplay that would be greatly appreciated!

Controls:
Shoot - Left Click
Reload - Right Click
Aim - Mouse
Move - WASD

CREDITS:
